org.apache.juneau.serializer

Class SerializerContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.Context
      • org.apache.juneau.BeanContext
        • org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerContext
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CsvSerializerContext, JsonSerializerContext, MsgPackSerializerContext, RdfSerializerContext, UonSerializerContext, XmlSerializerContext

    public class SerializerContext
extends BeanContext
    Contains a snapshot-in-time read-only copy of the settings on the Serializer class.
